summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges, discounts, and payment information related to a shipment made on July 3, 2001, with a total amount due of $36.32.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

events.title: FedEx Shipment
events.description: A package was shipped via FedEx from New York to Milan.

events.title: Delivery of Package
events.description: The package shipped by Jeffrey Epstein was delivered.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6809
keyFacts: The invoice number is 5-855-52503, dated July 13, 2001.
The total charges for the FedEx services amount to $36.32.
The package was dropped off on July 3, 2001, and delivered on July 9, 2001.
A discount of $1.08 was applied to the invoice.
The invoice includes a note about changes to the process for requesting invoice adjustments effective August 11, 2001.
